basis: The user followed a non-eating sequence (log, grounding, ultra-short action, purpose-check, water) and planned to decide on food without ingesting, indicating some action toward management but no actual eating occurred.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit internal conflict detected; user remains aligned with the plan and expresses continued hope.
negative_thought_patterns: Minimal; few negative beliefs noted. No clear self-blame or hopelessness; maintains a constructive, hopeful stance.
emotional_triggers: No specific triggers described beyond meal-related urges; routine-based prompts after meals appear central.
coaching_notes: Keep a supportive, steady tone; reinforce the value of ultra-short, repeatable steps. Track urge intensity and response to the micro-routines, and consider optional urge reframing or value-checks to further anchor motivation. Celebrate small successes to maintain momentum without increasing pressure.
